558500.name: Relativity Demo
558500.description:
Relativity will turn your world upside down. Curved surfaces and stairs allow you to walk from the floor, up the walls and across ceilings, shifting gravity and giving you a whole new perspective!
Collect crystals to power teleports and open up new areas. Some cystals are in easy reach, others require devious puzzles to be solved or challenges completed.
Landscape platforms can be moved and rotated using buttons and wheels to transform the landscape and form bridges. Machines require wiring together correctly to active them. If that isn't challenge enough, the local inhabitants are not entirely friendly. Watch out for dragons, jumping crabs and killer robots as well as laser beams which should be avoided at all costs (or find a laser pistol to dispatch them).
Now features three control styles : teleportation, sliding using the teleport beam or track pad control.
558500.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
